actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 94-1224.

official_title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures for the Committee on the Judiciary for inquiry and investigation relating to internal security.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Authorizes $80,000 in supplemental expenditures for the Senate Committee on the Judiciary for inquiry and investigation relating to the administration, operation, and enforcement of laws relating to espionage, sabotage, and the protection of the internal security of the United States.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures for the Committee on the Judiciary for inquiry and investigation relating to internal security.
